description: Monitor for unexpected deletion of a command history file, such as ConsoleHost_history.txt, ~/.zsh_history, or ~/.bash_history. Analytic 1 - Deletion of command history files (source="*WinEventLog:Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational" EventCode="23") OR (source="*WinEventLog:Security" EventCode="4663") FilePath LIKE '%ConsoleHost_history.txt%' AND ObjectType == "File" AND (UserAccessList LIKE '%1537%' OR UserAccessList LIKE '%DELETE%'))
